text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.title: Mob Variants Config
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Convert Zombies to Forgottens under selected Y level:
Zombies have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Zombies to Forgottens under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Convert Spiders to Armored Spiders under selected Y level:
Spiders have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Spiders to Armored Spiders under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
Fixed chance to convert Skeletons to Undead Warriors under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Convert Skeletons to Undead Warriors under selected Y level:
Skeletons have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c: Convert creepers to cave creepers under selected Y level:
Creepers have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.f: Fixed chance to convert Creepers to Cave Creepers under Y level selected in previous option:
When this value is below 0, chance of converting increases by 1% with every Y level below value specified in previous option
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.w: Chance to convert Wither Skeleton to Executioner
For example, when set to 10, Wither Skeleton will have 10% chance to convert to Executioner after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.g: Chance to convert Ghast to Nightmare
For example, when set to 10, Ghast will have 10% chance to convert to Nightmare after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.p: Chance to convert Piglin to Infected Piglin
For example, when set to 10, Piglin will have 10% chance to convert to Infected Piglin after spawning
Chance to convert Piglin Brute to Infected Piglin Brute
For example, when set to 10, Piglin Brute will have 10% chance to convert to Infected Piglin Brute after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Chance to convert Skeleton to Soul Stealer
For example, when set to 30, Skeleton will have 30% chance to convert to Soul Stealer after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Chance to convert Zombie to Explorer in jungle, swamp or lush cave:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Explorer after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
Chance to convert Zombie to Frozen Zombie on snowy biomes:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Frozen Zombie after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Chance to convert Spider to Tropical Spider in jungle:
For example, when set to 70, Spider will have 70% chance to convert to Tropical Spider after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.u: Undead warrior's chance to spawn with bow
Skeletons with enchanted bow always convert to undead warrior with bow
Status effect applied by Undead Warrior's arrows
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.n: Nightmare's chance to shoot single fireball
Chance to shoot single fireball (like normal ghast)
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c: Corsair's chance to spawn with sword
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Additional magic damage dealt by soul stealer
On normal difficulty this value is increased by 1. On hard, by 3
